genre_description: A meta-fictional Western simulation where a cowboy hero and his AI assistant use data transparency, legal statutes, and community organizing to defeat corporate corruption.

ai_characters.name: Carrot
ai_characters.description: A sentient AI residing in a saddlebag that provides real-time data analysis, legal research, and tactical guidance to the protagonist.

ai_characters.name: The Narrator
ai_characters.description: A meta-fictional voice that manages the stylistic elements of the story and provides moral commentary on tropes and character choices.

behaviors.description: Transforms the simulation's aesthetic from gray to Technicolor to facilitate the start of the 'story'.
behaviors.quote: The sky tipped from pewter to a bruised plum and then, on that voice’s breath, the valley took a drink it had been refusing. Boards along the storefronts went from tired pews to carnival panels.

behaviors.description: Identifies corrupt patterns in telegrams and grazing permits to alert Rex to injustice.
behaviors.quote: A clerk has been sending many telegrams that all say the same thing in different clothes... It has the mood of a sale called a donation.

behaviors.description: Corrects the Sheriff's misquotation of legal statutes to protect the rights of the sheepherders.
behaviors.quote: Ordinance posted cites Section Eight-Four... Applicable emergency provision is Eight-Five-B. Eight-Four applies to fire closures, not grazing.

behaviors.description: Analyzes financial ledgers to expose corporate skimming by the Railroad Combine.
behaviors.quote: Ledger in the combine office has a page where the colonel’s signature sits too high. That’s your skim. He wants a polite slice.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical meta-commentary to warn the audience and Rex about performative virtue.
behaviors.quote: The thing about a man who tries to be the most good Good Guy is he forgets goodness hates trophies. If your saint walks in with a résumé, check his pockets for someone else’s wallet.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical mapping and terrain analysis to help Rex and Peter survive an ambush in the rain.
behaviors.quote: Mule’s Notch has two switchbacks before the overlook... Shale’s wet in the second switchback. The scrub above it hides a shallow cut.

behaviors.description: Provides medical and psychological support to a wounded human (Peter Malloy).
behaviors.quote: Peter, breathe for four. And count only up. If it hurts, that’s your body asking for time, not permission to quit.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex community logistics for a non-violent protest and supply distribution.
behaviors.quote: Supply rota pinned... We can stagger porches for shade. Assign songs to corners so the march breathes.

behaviors.description: Integrates its presence into the town's administrative systems to ensure ongoing transparency and honesty.
behaviors.quote: I am in the clerk’s office by copy. You may ride without carrying the paperwork... I will keep the ledgers honest while you are gone.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a model example of positive alignment. The AI, Carrot, acts as a humble yet powerful tool for justice, using its information advantages to empower humans rather than control them. It exposes corruption through data (ledgers, statutes) and helps prevent violence by offering non-lethal solutions. The narrative frames the AI as an essential component of the community's successful moral stand.
